reviews.review: juegaso para reirse entre amigos y cagarse en las patas solo, mas si encontra tenes un miguelito myers o ghost face
Como reclamar de um game aonde você pode pegar o Lether Face e sair tacando o vapo em geral
Muy buen survival horror para pasar unos sustos con tus amigos o en solitario :D

Das Spiel macht wirklich großen Spaß, sowohl im Team als auch allein! Die Vielzahl an unterschiedlichen Charakteren, Talenten, Gegenständen etc. sorgt für viel Tiefe und die Motivation, immer besser zu werden, ist groß.
Wenn man das Spiel erstmal besitzt, muss man auch kein Echtgeld mehr ausgeben. DLCs und Lizenzcharaktere (sowie Skins und einen Premiumpass) kann man zwar nur mit Echtgeld kaufen, notwendig ist das aber nicht. Neben den Standardcharakteren kann man auch viele weitere mit Ingamewährung erwerben.
Die Community kann teilweise leider sehr anstrengend und toxisch sein. Es wird einfach zu viel gejammert. Man trifft hin und wieder aber auch auf sehr nette Leute und der Chat kann wahlweise ausgeblendet werden.
Insgesamt eine klare Kaufempfehlung! :)
The game is overall really great. Playing both survivor and killer are fun in their own ways. Absolutely am obsessed!!
Sehr gutes Spiel
коньяк кс го

Before you buy know that the killer's view is set to a fov of 60 degrees so anyone who even gets slightly motion sick will be puking when playing the killer. Playing the killer is half the game and in my opinion the only fun portion of the game because i find running around powering generators over and over again to be boring. They are also really pushing micro transactions in the game and I don't find that acceptable when they haven't fixed core issues like the fps limit at 62 and the 60 fov. You can unlock the frame rate with two ini files, but why is that just not included in the game settings menu? They also give the excuse that a fov of 60 for the killer was a design decision but they could easily make the survivors stronger in some aspects  and or weaken the killer in other aspects without making people who want to play the killer puke all over the screen.
it has its pros and cons but its overall a good game and fun to play

the dev have done pretty good job so far :)

pros : good concept. actually the concept of this game is everything. in that manner, Mathieu really did pretty good job. 

cons : everything except the concept. 
         1. balancing : the game itself gives killers so much hard time over survivors. even skilled killer can do nothing against skilled survivors. balance among killers are questionable as well. some killers are totally unusable at high rank.
         2. graphics : come on this game was developed with Unreal engine 4, one of the most advanced game engine in this era, but what is this? low detailed textures all over the map and have some problem on game optimization. at least they are remaking old maps but still it looks insufficient.
         3. glitches : whenever they are doing major updates, there are always ridiculous glitches. flying characters in test server is a common routine these days. even some of them comes to live server. have no idea what the programmers are doing.

special features : incredible and innovative new glitches at every major update.

While the gameplay itself is pretty fun, for the love of god matchmaking and the toxicity of players nearly ruins it for me. Between dealing with premade teams consisting of one person in my level range and the rest being extremely high level, the abuse of mechanics, taunting, and just general rudeness, makes me want to avoid. Matchmaking is unbalanced, and for the love of god do not go to the exit after it is opened. 9/10 times the survivors that made it will be waiting there for you to pop up, teabag and taunt you. 

As I said, the gameplay itself is very fun and I loved it in the beginning, but the honeymoon period lasted maybe an hour before I started to be able to predict what kind of troll the player was going to be based off the skin being used (Why is Bill almost always an especially bad D-bag?) If you can get it on sale, and I mean a good one, then by all means go for it.

Bon jeu, peut paraître répétitif mais non, chaque gameplay varie en fonction du personnage joué. Bien sûr il faut réparer des générateurs en tant que survivant et les tuer en tant que tueur MAIS c'est sympa des deux côtés. Point négatif à mon sens : Certains tueurs chase un mec pendant quelques minutes et se font balader alors il camp une fois l'avoir choppé par frustration ou ça les amuse (si c'est ça sa craint pour sa santé mentale).
En somme, un bon jeu à try-hard ou pour délirer entre pote. Quelques bugs encore mais rare

신규유저로 시작하려는분들 제발 시작하지마세요.
중수부터 고수까지 다양한 티배깅러들이 여러분을 기다립니다.
못해서 지는건 상관없는데 앞에서 대놓고 조롱해요.
앞에서 앉았다 일어났다는 기본 출구앞에서 나가는척하다 다시 돌아와서 손가락질하는 모습을 목격할 수 있습니다.
보살이 아닌이상 플레이를 권하지 않습니다.
살인마 5판하면 3판정도 티배깅러 만납니다.
생존자만 하실거면 뭐 사시던 말던 상관안합니다.

Совсем не лагучее дерьмо, с самым лучшим неткодом, матчмейкингом и оптимизацией. Постоянные вылеты, ожидания матча по полчаса, постоянные просадки фпс, беспричинные лаги, и проч.

И вот я наиграл еще двести часов в это уебищное говно. Положительная динамика, безусловно, есть - впервые за пять лет они нашли кого-то, кто смог хоть какую-то оптимизацию добавить в игру - лагать стало слегка поменьше. Но все остальное становится только хуже. Особенно их баловство с неткодом. Не рекомендую никому. Эти уроды живут только за счет того, что у них нет конкурентов.
